alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Atchison; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 5:11AM CST until February 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, a mix of light snow and freezing drizzle. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and northwest Missouri. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
